metadata.title: Orbital Decay
metadata.author: Jack CognitiveE
metadata.description:
PATCH AFTER MULTIVERSE, REQUIRES FUSION 0.1.6+ AND THE RENEGADE COLLECTION, PATCH BOTH OF THOSE BEFORE OD
This addon prooooobably will be based on a bunch of other games, which will be implemented as poorly as possible. Due to both lack of skill and total laziness Â¯\_(ãƒ„)_/Â¯. The game of the -ðŸŸ.versions iiis... Crossout - a post-apocalyptic MMO action game, the devs of which didn't pay me for promoting da thing:(
This is what the current version (-ðŸŸ.ðŸ¦.) can offer you, dear people:
- Some Crossout weapons turned into the Ravagers' weapons (here they are, from left to right: 'Adapter', 'Charon', 'Thyrsus', 'Aurora', 'Trigger', 'Destructor', 'Prometheus', 'Helios'. They are buyable rn just due to the lack of other contentðŸ˜”); - Things I could't put into the upper section: - 1(3) new Player Ship (Ravagers'; introduction purposes); - The Ballista Drones[DEF/BOARD, + Legion version], Zenith Lasers II and III, Legion Missiles, Legion Drones[Laser I, Laser II, Bomb]. Mostly unobtainable.
(Huge thanks to sillysnadvich for making 'Prometheus'' and 'Helios'' perks work, i luv uâ¤)
